text: Lisiku litinchaona wakulupilila wachilume ni wakulupilila wachikongwe lilanguka lyao linankwenda paujo pao ni kunkono wao wan’dyo, (achisalilidwaga yanti): “Kusengwa kwenu lelo! (Nikugajinjila) Matimbe ga ku Mbepo, gasikujilima chapasi pakwe sulo! Tim’be wandamo mwalakwemo! Kwalakweko ni kupunda kwekulungwa nnope!”
